thread.title: Nice place to stay.
thread.title_full: Nice place to stay. - Review of Holiday Inn Paris Opera-Grands Boulevards, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: texasstiles2017
title: Nice place to stay.
text:
This hotel is a central location for the city. You can get on the metro right in front of the hotel. The rooms are nice, clean and modern. There are lots of restaurants right around the hotel. The staff spoke English and helped us with directions and getting a taxi. They had a nice breakfast. Overall this was a great hotel.
Room Tip: Right next to metro. See more room tips
